title: Bowie digs the Mashups
body: Bowie liked <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/04/26/Jay_Z_Construction_Set.aspx">The Grey Album</a> so much that he's offering a <a href="http://www.wired.com/news/digiwood/0,1412,63314,00.html">new sports car to the best mashup of any 2 of his songs</a>.  It'll be interesting to see what mixes spring out of this lazy creativity.  Maybe I should fire up the copy of Acid I installed back when I took computer music @ RIT and give it a whirl.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-05-05

Bowie digs the Mashups

Bowie liked
